entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 02:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
